mapper.select: SELECT sr.rid AS srrid, sr.role_name AS srrolename, sp.pid AS sppid, sp.`code` AS spcode, sp.`name` AS spname FROM soat_roles sr LEFT JOIN soat_roles_permissions srp ON sr.rid = srp.r_id LEFT JOIN soat_permission sp ON sp.pid = srp.p_id WHERE sr.role_name=#{nickname}

SELECT sr.rid AS srrid,sr.role_name AS srrolename,sp.pid AS sppid, sp.`code` AS spcode, sp.`name` AS spname,scp.pc_id AS scppcid,scp.`code` AS scpcode, scp.`name` AS scpname, scp.`level` AS scplevel FROM soat_roles as sr LEFT JOIN soat_roles_permissions as srp ON sr.rid = srp.r_id LEFT JOIN soat_permission AS sp ON sp.pid = srp.p_id LEFT JOIN soat_childre_permission AS scp ON scp.`level` = sp.pid
mapper.update: UPDATE soat_roles SET role_name = #{roleName} WHERE rid = #{rid}
mapper.delete: DELETE soat_roles,soat_users_roles,soat_roles_permissions FROM soat_roles LEFT JOIN soat_users_roles on soat_roles.rid = soat_users_roles.r_id LEFT JOIN soat_roles_permissions ON soat_roles_permissions.r_id = soat_roles.rid WHERE soat_roles.rid=#{rid}
